abstract: Apple is in the early stages of negotiating with the major record labels for a service that would send streams of music customized to users’ tastes.
snippet: Apple is in the early stages of negotiating with the major record labels for a service that would send streams of music customized to users’ tastes.
lead_paragraph: In a move that could shake up the growing field of Internet radio, Apple plans to develop a service that would compete with Pandora Media by sending streams of music customized to users’ tastes, three people briefed on the plans said late Thursday.

headline.main: Apple Plans Web Radio Challenge to Pandora
headline.print_headline: Apple Plans Web Radio Challenge To Pandora

byline.original: By Ben Sisario and Nick Wingfield

abstract: Also, as the political conventions draw to a close, Mitt Romney announces a new series of 15 advertisements to run in battleground states; and Dan Balz has written 1,500 front-page articles for The Washington Post.
snippet: Also, as the political conventions draw to a close, Mitt Romney announces a new series of 15 advertisements to run in battleground states; and Dan Balz has written 1,500 front-page articles for The Washington Post.
lead_paragraph: The intimate connection between digital media and the devices that play them was in full effect on Thursday, as the online store Amazon.com announced a range of new Kindles for reading, listening and watching. Also on Thursday, it was learned that Apple was working on adding an Internet radio service to its devices, along the lines of Pandora.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: New Amazon Devices, and Apple’s Plans for Digital Radio
